abstract.text: A request to modify the attributes of a task.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: object when the user marks a task as complete or changes the triggers used to generate reminders for the task. The intent object can contain the task information and values for any changed attributes.
To handle this intent, the handler object in your Intents extension must adopt the
protocol. Your handler should confirm the request and create an
object with the updated task information.
The following table lists additional attributes of this intent object:

Users can ask Siri to modify task attributes in a variety of ways. The table below provides a few sample phrases in different languages. You can use these phrases during testing to trigger your intents. This list isn’t exhaustive and Siri may recognize many other phrases.
Mark dry cleaning as complete on
Check call dad off my to do list
把给爸爸打电话从待办事项列表里面去掉
入面將乾洗標示為完成
剔咗待辦事項列表入面嘅打電話俾爸爸
從我的待辦事項列表中刪除打電話給爸爸
入面将干洗标示为完成
剔咗待办事项列表入面嘅打电话俾爸爸
ضع علامة على تنظيف الملابس بأنه مكتمل
قم بإلغاء الاتصال على أبي من قائمة الأعمال
marker ring til far som færdig i min at gøre liste
Hake Papa anrufen auf meiner Erinnerungsliste ab
Tacha llamar a papá de mi lista de cosas por hacer
Marque laver le linge comme terminé sur
Supprime appeler papa de ma liste de choses à faire
תסמני את להתקשר לאבא ברשימת הדברים לעשות
Segna pulizia a secco come completato su
Segna chiamare papà come fatto sulla mia lista da fare
でドライクリーニングを完了済みにして
Todoリストにある父に電話に完了のマークをつけて
아빠에게 전화하기를 내 할 일 목록에서 체크하기
Tandakan panggil ayah sebagai selesai pada senarai tugasan
Huk av ringe pappa på gjørelisten min
Vink papa bellen af op mijn takenlijst
Marcar lavagem a seco como concluída no
Marcar ligar para o pai como concluído na minha lista de tarefas
Отметь позвонить папе в моём списке дел
Bocka av ring pappa från min att göra-lista
ทำเครื่องหมายว่าเสร็จแล้วที่ซักแห้งบนแอพ
ทำเครื่องหมายโทรหาพ่อว่าเสร็จแล้วในรายการสิ่งที่ต้องทำ
Ödevlerim listesindeki son anımsatıcıyı yapıldı işaretle
represents the name of the app whose Intents extension handles the request.

abstract.text: Empower people to customize interactions for your app on their device.
A request to fulfill in your app or Intents extension.
A request to modify the attributes of a task.
Initializes the intent object with information about the task and the changes that you want to make.
Initializes the intent object with information about the task and the changes that you want to make.
The priority for the task.
The location-based trigger to apply to the task.
The status to apply to the task.
The task targetted for modification.
The title for the task.
The time-based trigger to apply to the task.
The handler interface for updating the attributes of an existing task.
Your response to a request to modify the attributes of an existing task.
Constants indicating the completion state of a task.
A protocol that enables an object to be encoded and decoded for archiving and distribution.
A protocol that objects adopt to provide functional copies of themselves.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A protocol that enables encoding and decoding in a manner that is robust against object substitution attacks.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
